post.body: I can DM you! Check your DMs...
Nevermind, here it is: http://tinyurl.com/9utnba
I've done it, there's a trick to it. DM me with your email address, I'll send you the instructions.
Exactos & wax/roller days. It hurts just to imagine.
& created more. IT, software dev, evolution of design industry, list is endless. We're fortunate to live & thrive today.
Ya know, the funny part is twenty years ago, I was one of those who worried that computers would take away jobs. Ha!
Am.One.With.The.Computer. Can you feel the zen? LOL Need a crow bar to pull me away!
I need to get our more, always glued to an actual computer. To use my iPhone once a month is a LOT! No cell svc at home anyway.
Oh, yeah! I saw one at the airport a couple months back. Talk about a last-minute souvenir!
Hair of the dog helps! I think you'd be better off with more Tequila tho. Mixing beer with hard stuff? I dunno!
It's Friday. Choke down some Excedrin and coffee, it'll soon be over.
At least you enjoyed yourself. I took a shot of NyQuil and went to bed at 8pm. Woo hoo!
You're not off to a good new year start, are you? My sympathies. I hope you at least had fun doing whatever it was!
LMAO, my cat was asleep next to my comp when I tried this, took a flying leap across the office!
LMAO! My cat just fell in the toilet!
Educating another I-just-don't-get-the-point-of-Twitter person. If you have a blog, why WOULDN'T you use Twitter? D'oh.
RT @styletime: RT @johnhaydon: 8 Free eBooks on Twitter http://snipr.com/99bo5
If your output is conservative, all you should expect are conservative results. Maybe that's why I'm crazy.
Hubby & I still sick. Looks like all we're drinking tonight is NyQuil. Have a Happy NY everyone!
RT @JesseNewhart: Adobe PDF Guide: How to Do Everything with PDF Files: http://bit.ly/MtlC This is priceless!
